protocol.name: P-GSE28600-1
text: ID_REF = probe ID of ATH1 GeneChip
VALUE = RMA normalized in log2 expression

protocol.name: P-GSE28600-10
protocol.text: Growing T87 cells were exposed to 25 uM ABA for 24hr.

protocol.name: P-GSE28600-11
protocol.text: Growing T87 cells were exposed to 300 uM SA for 3hr.

protocol.name: P-GSE28600-12
protocol.text: Growing T87 cells were exposed to 300 uM SA for 24hr.

protocol.name: P-GSE28600-13
protocol.text: Growing T87 cells were exposed to 25uM ABA and 300 uM SA for 3hr.

protocol.name: P-GSE28600-14
protocol.text: Growing T87 cells were exposed to 25uM ABA and 300 uM SA for 24hr.

protocol.name: P-GSE28600-15
protocol.text: Growing T87 cells were exposed to 100 uM MeJA for 3hr.

protocol.name: P-GSE28600-16
protocol.text: Growing T87 cells were exposed to 100 uM MeJA for 24hr.

protocol.name: P-GSE28600-17
protocol.text: Growing T87 cells were exposed to 25uM ABA and 100 uM MeJA for 3hr.

protocol.name: P-GSE28600-18
protocol.text: Growing T87 cells were exposed to 25uM ABA and 100 uM MeJA for 24hr.

protocol.name: P-GSE28600-2
protocol.text: Growing T87 cells were exposed to 0.6% EtOH.

protocol.name: P-GSE28600-3
protocol.text: The cells were incubated and subcultured every seven days in 20 mL of a liquid modified JPL medium (Axelos et al., 1992) in a 100 mL baffled Erlenmeyer flask at 100 rpm on a rotary shake at 24C at a 16 h light and 8 h dark cycle.

protocol.name: P-GSE28600-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted from frozen tissue using TRIzol reagent (Invitrogen) and purified using a RNase MinElute Cleanup Kit (Qiagen).

protocol.name: P-GSE28600-5
protocol.text: First-strand of cDNA was synthesized using 16 ug of total RNA and SuperScript Double-stranded cDNA Synthesis kit (Invitrogen). The labeled cRNA was synthesized using BioArray RNA Transcripts Labeling Kit (T7) (ENZO Life Sciences inc.). After labeling, the cRNA was digested partially by incubating in 40 mM Tris-acetate, pH8.0, 100 mM KOAc, 30 mM MgOAc, at 94C for 35 min.

protocol.name: P-GSE28600-6
protocol.text: 30 ug cRNA was hybridized to ATH1 GeneChip arrays.

protocol.name: P-GSE28600-7
protocol.text: Arrays were scanned using a GSC3000 scanner according to the manufacturer's recommendations.

protocol.name: P-GSE28600-8
protocol.text: RMA normalized using Cel file with affllmGUI.

protocol.name: P-GSE28600-9
protocol.text: Growing T87 cells were exposed to 25 uM ABA for 3hr.
